what: Colour Plots With Palettes From Academic Institutions
title: Colour Plots With Palettes From Academic Institutions
text: goal AcademicThemes provide functionality allow users easily colour plots colour palettes various academic institutions.

title: Colour Plots With Palettes From Academic Institutions
text: can install development version AcademicThemes GitHub :

what: Get An Academic Colour Palette — academic_colour_palette
title: Get An Academic Colour Palette — academic_colour_palette
text: Return either specific colour palette colour palettes offered AcademicThemes.

title: Get An Academic Colour Palette — academic_colour_palette
Get An Academic Colour Palette — academic_colour_palette
text: palette string containing name palette returned. name given palettes returned instead. n number indicating many different colours included palette. specified specific colours palette returned.

title: Get An Academic Colour Palette — academic_colour_palette
text: single vector list vectors containing HEX codes academic colour palettes.

title: Get An Academic Colour Palette — academic_colour_palette
code: # Get the colour palette used by the UKRI academic_colour_palette("ukri") #> [1] "#2D2E5F" "#3A88A9" "#00BAD2"

what: Get The Academic Colour Palette Names — academic_colour_palette_names
title: Get The Academic Colour Palette Names — academic_colour_palette_names
text: Get Academic Colour Palette Names

title: Get The Academic Colour Palette Names — academic_colour_palette_names
Get The Academic Colour Palette Names — academic_colour_palette_names
text: vector names colour palettes available AcademicThemes.

title: Get The Academic Colour Palette Names — academic_colour_palette_names

what: Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_colour_academic_c
title: Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_colour_academic_c
text: Scale Plot Colours Academic Themes (Continuous)

title: Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_colour_academic_c
Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_colour_academic_c
text: palette_name name colour palette AcademicThemes. ... Arguments passed ggplot2::scale_colour_gradientn()

title: Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_colour_academic_c
text: layer can added ggplot2 object.

title: Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_colour_academic_c
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(   data.frame(     x = runif(1500),     y = runif(1500)   ),   aes(x = x, y = y, colour = x) ) +   geom_point() +   scale_colour_academic_c("cruk") +   theme_classic() +   labs(     x = "X-Axis",     y = "Y-Axis",     colour = "Colour"   )

what: Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_colour_academic_d
title: Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_colour_academic_d
text: Scale Plot Colours Academic Themes (Discrete)

title: Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_colour_academic_d
Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_colour_academic_d
text: palette_name name colour palette AcademicThemes. ... Arguments passed ggplot2::discrete_scale().

title: Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_colour_academic_d
text: layer can added ggplot2 object.

title: Scale Plot Colours With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_colour_academic_d
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(   data.frame(     x = runif(1500),     y = runif(1500),     c = sample(LETTERS[1:3], 1500, replace = TRUE)   ),   aes(x = x, y = y, colour = c) ) +   geom_point() +   scale_colour_academic_d("cruk") +   theme_classic() +   labs(     x = "X-Axis",     y = "Y-Axis",     colour = "Colour"   )

what: Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_fill_academic_c
title: Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_fill_academic_c
text: Scale Plot Fills Academic Themes (Continuous)

title: Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_fill_academic_c
Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_fill_academic_c
text: palette_name name colour palette AcademicThemes. ... Arguments passed ggplot2::scale_fill_gradientn()

title: Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_fill_academic_c
text: layer can added ggplot2 object.

title: Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Continuous) — scale_fill_academic_c
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(   data.frame(     x = rnorm(10000),     y = rnorm(10000)   ),   aes(x = x, y = y) ) +   geom_hex() +   scale_fill_academic_c("cruk") +   theme_classic() +   labs(     x = "X-Axis",     y = "Y-Axis",     fill = "Fill"   )

what: Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_fill_academic_d
title: Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_fill_academic_d
text: Scale Plot Fills Academic Themes (Discrete)

title: Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_fill_academic_d
Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_fill_academic_d
text: palette_name name colour palette AcademicThemes. ... Arguments passed ggplot2::discrete_scale().

title: Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_fill_academic_d
text: layer can added ggplot2 object.

title: Scale Plot Fills With Academic Themes (Discrete) — scale_fill_academic_d
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(   data.frame(     x = LETTERS[1:5],     y = 5:1   ),   aes(x = x, y = y, fill = x) ) +   geom_col() +   scale_fill_academic_d("cruk") +   theme_classic() +   labs(     x = "X-Axis",     y = "Y-Axis",     fill = "Fill"   )
